item.title: Free Wall Art Printable: Minimalist Botanical Sprout
item.description: Freshen up your home with botanical abstract wall art. The minimalist sprout design is fitting for a variety of rooms. Try it out in your bathroom, office, bedroom, or hallway! The green neutral earthy tones also help create a soothing atmosphere.

item.title: Buying Wall Art: Digital Printable or Physical Print?
item.description: When purchasing décor for your walls, you can choose between buying digital printable or physical prints. Not sure which option to choose? This guide provides a quick comparison between the benefits of buying printable versus print.

item.title: Standard Frame Sizes for Wall Art
item.description: If you’re looking to add some personality to your home, hanging wall art can be an easy and affordable option.

item.title: Free SVG Cut File: Unicorn with Flower Crown
item.description: Sprinkle some magic in your life with unicorns! This simple unicorn cut design with an adorable flower crown is perfect for your next arts and crafts project.

item.title: File Types for Cutting Machines: PNG, SVG, EPS, DXF
item.description: Not sure which cut file type you need to download for your next craft project? This guide will give you a quick rundown!
